title: UFYB 78: Resisting V. Allowing Negative Emotion
itunes:title: Resisting V. Allowing Negative Emotion
description:
Join me on this episode to discover how to start implementing the practice of truly allowing your negative feelings. Baby steps are crucial in working on your skeptical brain, and starting here is going to help you tremendously with your self-coaching.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/78
content:encoded:

itunes:subtitle: Why you fear having negative emotions.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
